properties.areaDesc: Indiana, PA; Butler, PA; Armstrong, PA; Allegheny, PA; Westmoreland, PA
properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 10:57AM EST until January 8 at 11:30AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh PA
properties.description:
At 1057 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line
extending from near Freeport to Gibsonia to Aliquippa, moving
southeast at 35 mph.

HAZARD...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 30 mph.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.

This includes the following highways...
Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 29 and 54.
Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 77 and 79.

Locations impacted include...
Penn Hills, McCandless Township, Monroeville, Cranberry, Vandergrift,
Apollo, Plum, Murrysville, Hampton Township, New Kensington, Lower
Burrell and Harrison Township.
properties.instruction:
Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes
your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra
time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead
to accidents.

Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the
visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.

NWSheadline: A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM EST FOR WEST CENTRAL INDIANA...SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER...NORTHEASTERN ALLEGHENY... NORTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND AND SOUTHWESTERN ARMSTRONG COUNTIES
